verses.verse: Behold, the <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H935>cometh<s%>, and thy <S%H7998>spoil<s%> shall be <S%H2505>divided<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of thee.

For I will <S%H622>gather<s%> all <S%H1471>nations<s%> against <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> to <S%H4421>battle<s%>; and the <S%H5892>city<s%> shall be <S%H3920>taken<s%>, and the <S%H1004>houses<s%> <S%H8155>rifled<s%>, and the <S%H802>women<s%> <S%H7901>ravished<s%> <S%H7693><s%>; and <S%H2677>half<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> shall go <S%H3318>forth<s%> into <S%H1473>captivity<s%>, and the <S%H3499>residue<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> shall not be cut <S%H3772>off<s%> from the <S%H5892>city<s%>.

Then shall the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> go <S%H3318>forth<s%>, and <S%H3898>fight<s%> against those <S%H1471>nations<s%>, as <S%H3117>when<s%> he <S%H3898>fought<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H7128>battle<s%>.

And his <S%H7272>feet<s%> shall <S%H5975>stand<s%> in that <S%H3117>day<s%> upon the <S%H2022>mount<s%> of <S%H2132>Olives<s%>, which is <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> on the <S%H6924>east<s%>, and the <S%H2022>mount<s%> of <S%H2132>Olives<s%> shall <S%H1234>cleave<s%> in the <S%H2677>midst<s%> thereof toward the <S%H4217>east<s%> and toward the <S%H3220>west<s%>, and there shall be a <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1516>valley<s%>; and <S%H2677>half<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> shall <S%H4185>remove<s%> toward the <S%H6828>north<s%>, and <S%H2677>half<s%> of it toward the <S%H5045>south<s%>.

And ye shall <S%H5127>flee<s%> to the <S%H1516>valley<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountains<s%>; for the <S%H1516>valley<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> shall <S%H5060>reach<s%> unto <S%H682>Azal<s%>: yea, ye shall <S%H5127>flee<s%>, like as ye <S%H5127>fled<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H7494>earthquake<s%> in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H5818>Uzziah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>: and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> my <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%>, and all the <S%H6918>saints<s%> with thee. the mountains: or, my mountains for the: or, when he shall touch the valley of the mountains to the place he separated

And it shall come to pass in that <S%H3117>day<s%>, that the <S%H216>light<s%> shall not be <S%H3368>clear<s%>, nor <S%H7087>dark<s%> <S%H7087><s%>: that the: that is, it shall not be clear in some places, and dark in other places of the world clear: Heb. precious dark: Heb. thickness

But it shall be <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> which shall be <S%H3045>known<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, not <S%H3117>day<s%>, nor <S%H3915>night<s%>: but it shall come to pass, that at <S%H6153>evening<s%> <S%H6256>time<s%> it shall be <S%H216>light<s%>. it shall be: or, the day shall be one

And it shall be in that <S%H3117>day<s%>, that <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H4325>waters<s%> shall go <S%H3318>out<s%> from <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>; <S%H2677>half<s%> of them toward the <S%H6931>former<s%> <S%H3220>sea<s%>, and <S%H2677>half<s%> of them toward the <S%H314>hinder<s%> <S%H3220>sea<s%>: in <S%H7019>summer<s%> and in <S%H2779>winter<s%> shall it be. former: or, eastern

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall be <S%H4428>king<s%> over all the <S%H776>earth<s%>: in that <S%H3117>day<s%> shall there be <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H259>one<s%>.

All the <S%H776>land<s%> shall be <S%H5437>turned<s%> as a <S%H6160>plain<s%> from <S%H1387>Geba<s%> to <S%H7417>Rimmon<s%> <S%H5045>south<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>: and it shall be lifted <S%H7213>up<s%>, and <S%H3427>inhabited<s%> in her place, from <S%H1144>Benjamin's<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> unto the <S%H4725>place<s%> of the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%>, unto the <S%H6434>corner<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%>, and from the <S%H4026>tower<s%> of <S%H2606>Hananeel<s%> unto the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H3342>winepresses<s%>. turned: or, compassed inhabited: or, shall abide

And men shall <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in it, and there shall be no more utter <S%H2764>destruction<s%>; but <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> shall be <S%H983>safely<s%> <S%H3427>inhabited<s%>. shall be: or, shall abide

And this shall be the <S%H4046>plague<s%> wherewith the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H5062>smite<s%> all the <S%H5971>people<s%> that have <S%H6633>fought<s%> against <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>; Their <S%H1320>flesh<s%> shall consume <S%H4743>away<s%> while they <S%H5975>stand<s%> upon their <S%H7272>feet<s%>, and their <S%H5869>eyes<s%> shall consume <S%H4743>away<s%> in their <S%H2356>holes<s%>, and their <S%H3956>tongue<s%> shall consume <S%H4743>away<s%> in their <S%H6310>mouth<s%>.

And it shall come to pass in that <S%H3117>day<s%>, that a <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H4103>tumult<s%> from the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall be among them; and they shall lay <S%H2388>hold<s%> every <S%H376>one<s%> on the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of his <S%H7453>neighbour<s%>, and his <S%H3027>hand<s%> shall rise <S%H5927>up<s%> against the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of his <S%H7453>neighbour<s%>.

And <S%H3063>Judah<s%> also shall <S%H3898>fight<s%> at <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>; and the <S%H2428>wealth<s%> of all the <S%H1471>heathen<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%> shall be gathered <S%H622>together<s%>, <S%H2091>gold<s%>, and <S%H3701>silver<s%>, and <S%H899>apparel<s%>, in <S%H3966>great<s%> <S%H7230>abundance<s%>. Judah: or, thou also, O Judah shalt at: or, against

And so shall be the <S%H4046>plague<s%> of the <S%H5483>horse<s%>, of the <S%H6505>mule<s%>, of the <S%H1581>camel<s%>, and of the <S%H2543>ass<s%>, and of all the <S%H929>beasts<s%> that shall be in <S%H1992>these<s%> <S%H4264>tents<s%>, as this <S%H4046>plague<s%>.

And it shall come to pass, that every one that is <S%H3498>left<s%> of all the <S%H1471>nations<s%> which <S%H935>came<s%> against <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> shall even go <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H1767>from<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> to <S%H8141>year<s%> to <S%H7812>worship<s%> the <S%H4428>King<s%>, the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, and to <S%H2287>keep<s%> the <S%H2282>feast<s%> of <S%H5521>tabernacles<s%>.

And it shall be, that whoso will not come <S%H5927>up<s%> of all the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> unto <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> to <S%H7812>worship<s%> the <S%H4428>King<s%>, the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, even upon them shall be no <S%H1653>rain<s%>.

And if the <S%H4940>family<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> go not <S%H5927>up<s%>, and <S%H935>come<s%> not, that have no rain; there shall be the <S%H4046>plague<s%>, wherewith the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H5062>smite<s%> the <S%H1471>heathen<s%> that come not <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H2287>keep<s%> the <S%H2282>feast<s%> of <S%H5521>tabernacles<s%>. that have no: Heb. upon whom there is not

This shall be the <S%H2403>punishment<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, and the <S%H2403>punishment<s%> of all <S%H1471>nations<s%> that come not <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H2287>keep<s%> the <S%H2282>feast<s%> of <S%H5521>tabernacles<s%>. punishment: or, sin

In that <S%H3117>day<s%> shall there be upon the <S%H4698>bells<s%> of the <S%H5483>horses<s%>, <S%H6944>HOLINESS<s%> UNTO THE <S%H3068>LORD<s%>; and the <S%H5518>pots<s%> in the <S%H3068>LORD'S<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> shall be like the <S%H4219>bowls<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%>. bells: or, bridles

Yea, every <S%H5518>pot<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> and in <S%H3063>Judah<s%> shall be <S%H6944>holiness<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>: and all they that <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> and <S%H3947>take<s%> of them, and <S%H1310>seethe<s%> therein: and in that <S%H3117>day<s%> there shall be no more the <S%H3669>Canaanite<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>.
